scripts.preversion: npm test && npm run lint && npm run build && npm run prettier-commit && npm run generate-main-exports-commit && npm run documentation-commit
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm publish && npm run update-in-other-repos
scripts.prettier-commit: git diff --exit-code && npm run prettier && git add src && git commit --allow-empty -m "Prettier"
scripts.documentation-commit: git diff --exit-code && npm run documentation && git add docs && git commit --allow-empty -m "Documentation"
scripts.generate-main-exports-commit: git diff --exit-code && npm run generate-main-exports && npm run prettier && git add src && git commit --allow-empty -m "Updating exports"
scripts.--update-in-other-repos: npm run update-in-other-krmitka && npm run update-in-other-collboard
scripts.--update-in-other-collboard: cd ../../HeduApp/collboard && git stash && npm i everstorage@latest && git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit --allow-empty -m "Update of everstorage" && git push && git stash pop
scripts.--update-in-other-krmitka: cd ../../cso/krmitka && git stash && npm i everstorage@latest && git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit --allow-empty -m "Update of everstorage" && git push && git stash pop
